title.text: Use of ',Support Vector Learning for Chunk Identification

introductionContent.text: In this paper, we explore the use of Support Vector Machines (SVMs) for CoNLL-2000 shared task, chunk identification.
SVMs are so-called large margin classifiers and are well-known as their good generalization performance.
We investigate how SVMs with a very large number of features perform with the classification task of chunk labelling.

tableCaptions.text: Table 1: The results per chunk type with our  proposed SVMs based method
